body_html: This issue is huge for me. My life would be way easier if everything just had batching by default. And ideally for arbitrary batch shapes, as in torch.potrf accepts [2, 3, 5, 5] just as well as [6, 5, 5].
body_text: This issue is huge for me. My life would be way easier if everything just had batching by default. And ideally for arbitrary batch shapes, as in torch.potrf accepts [2, 3, 5, 5] just as well as [6, 5, 5].
body: This issue is huge for me. My life would be way easier if everything just had batching by default. And ideally for arbitrary batch shapes, as in `torch.potrf` accepts [2, 3, 5, 5] just as well as [6, 5, 5].
